definition.text: By default, nodes are locked to a rotational symmetry around their parent node. The symmetry may span 360 degrees or less, depending on the setting!

paragraphs.text: When you click on the Angle to Parent Node button, you cycle among five different settings: 45, 90, 180 and 360 degrees, plus the option to dissable the rotational symmetry.

Take a quick look at the setting selected on each of the offspring of the Lightning Strike Backtesting Session node: Trading Parameters, Trading System Reference, and the Trading Engine Reference. They are all set to 180 degrees, right?
